inclusion.criterion: obesity, BMI > P. 97 (Jenni et al., 2011) or overweight, BMI >P.90
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: major somatic or psychiatric disease without adequate treatment,
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: weight-relevant medication (antiepileptic drugs, methylphenhydate and similar medication)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has Paget's Disease of Bone, but meets inclusion criteria. Exclusion due to major somatic disease and weight-relevant medication.
